title: All the Backlist! April 13, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty discusses The Prey of Gods, The Color of Magic, Red Dwarf, and more great older books.
This week’s episode was sponsored by Bas Bleu: Books & Gifts for Avid Readers.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy by Douglas Adams
Space Opera by Catherynne M. Valente
Red Dwarf: Infinity Welcomes Careful Drivers by Grant Naylor
The Prey of Gods by Nicky Drayden
The Eyre Affair by Jasper Fforde
To Say Nothing of the Dog by Connie Willis
How To Live Safely in a Science Fictional Universe by Charles Yu
The Long Way to a Small, Angry Planet by Becky Chambers
The Color of Magic by Terry Pratchett
Another Fine Myth by Robert Asprin
Last Chance to See by Douglas Adams
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
